channel.title: *hand Raised* i need help.. again
channel.description:
2 QUESTIONS..
#1how do i edit how fast a person lvls while clicks the door to raise strength or searching hay.. ect..
#2how do i add commands like ::alltome and ::pnpc
who ever replys with a good answer gets a good heart :)

item.title: *hand Raised* i need help.. again
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

i lolled at title, so ill help. but next time use my thread
search for

case ####:

the #### is the object id of the thing you click
edit this part in the case

addSkillXP(x, y);

x = ammount of xp per click
y = skill id number

Read full topic
